definition[0]: happening before the natural or proper time
example[0]: his premature death due to cancer
definition[1]: a premature baby is born before the usual time of birth
example[3]: The baby was six weeks premature.
definition[2]: done too early or too soon
example[5]: Any talk of a deal is premature.
example[6]: It would be premature to accuse anyone until the investigation is complete.
note[0]: it is premature (for somebody) to do something
